full_threads.body:
Hello Rica,

Could you please upload the attached and below project to our website asap?

Thanks

Wenona Boarding House Bathroom Upgrade
Builder: Rogers Construction Group
Architect: Leaf Architecture
Location: 176 Walker St, North Sydney NSW 2060
Brief: Supply and install Duracube Floor Mount Overhead Braced (3FOB) toilet partitioning system along with complementing shower seats and splash nibs.
Product Colours: Doors - 124 Aquamarine Natural Finish, Nibs & Panels - 86 Ghostgum Natural Finish
Product Used: 3FOB Floor Mount Overhead Braced

Please use the below pic as the main photo and the photo seen on the https://duracube.com.au/projects/ page.



Regards,
Stella Simpson
